header.tagline: Wespee — Essential protection for your money.

1.text: Every day, thousands of people are targeted through mobile money. Fake texts, scam calls posing as support, identity takeovers... Why? Because with every payment, your phone number gets exposed and can end up in the wrong hands. And most of the time, that alone is enough for a scammer.

2.text: With your new payment identity, @YourTag, you can now send and receive money without exposing your personal details. So you're finally protected from phishing, identity theft, SIM swapping, and social engineering, the scams that impact thousands of mobile money users every day.

3.text: Security is a core value at Wespee. Our solutions use next-gen technology to deliver strong protection for your data and your money, built to meet the highest financial industry standards.
3.caption: Security is not a myth.

features.tagline: Everything to help you save time
features.description: You can now unify all your mobile money accounts in one place to send, receive, spend, and track your expenses without switching between apps. With Wespee, everything happens in one click and you save time.
features.disclaimer: *Wespee can never withdraw money from your Mobile Money accounts without your consent.

Wespee is your new world: more modern, more fun, with a unique user experience. Discover new features and innovative ways to use your money.

All your services are connected together in a single ecosystem that simplifies your life and gives you more freedom every day.

1.title: Acceptance of terms
1.text: By creating an account and using Wespee, you agree to all of our terms and conditions. They define your rights and obligations, as well as those of Wespee, to ensure a reliable and secure service.

2.title: Account creation and eligibility
2.text: To register, you must provide a valid phone number, a mandatory referral code, and link at least one Mobile Money account. Without these elements, your account cannot be activated.

3.title: Security and transaction protection
3.text: All your operations are protected by enhanced authentication (OTP, PIN code) and data encryption to prevent fraud or unauthorized use.

4.title: Fees and associated costs
4.text: Each transaction made via Wespee incurs a fixed fee of 50 XOF. Additional fees may apply depending on Mobile Money operators or integrated partners.

5.title: Referral program
5.text: A user can refer others using a unique code. The referrer earns 10 XOF on each transaction made by the referred user during their first uses.

6.title: Data usage and confidentiality
6.text: Your personal information is handled in accordance with data protection regulations. Wespee never sells your data.

7.title: User responsibility
7.text: You are responsible for keeping your credentials confidential. Any action performed from your account is your responsibility.

8.title: Mobile Money account management
8.text: You can link up to four Mobile Money accounts to your profile. Each addition requires authentication to ensure security.

9.title: Fraud monitoring and prevention
9.text: In case of suspicious activity, Wespee may suspend or block an account, request verification documents, or permanently close the account.

10.title: Updates and changes
10.text: The terms may evolve according to regulations or service needs. Continued use implies acceptance of the updated rules.
